ComicInfo.Summary: The Mission That Never Was Part 1: One If by Land: The Joes are given a covert mission by the original Joe to deliver a high stakes piece of equipment for the Jugglers. Cobra finds out and comes after the tech. Mayhem ensues and Hawk is shot.
ComicInfo.Title: The Mission That Never Was Part 1: One If by Land
